Entries.SiMonsterFriends1: A group of monsters with human disguise talismans stopped by earlier.#$b#I told them to be careful but they're really curious about your people.#$b#Could you keep an eye on them please?#$b#I don't think they mean any harm, but they could be in danger up there.
I heard we have some new faces in town.#$e#You know what that means, right?#$e#New customers!$1
Looks like the falltime tourists have started arriving early this year!#$b#Please do what you can to help them feel welcome @.
